description: Schema policies which impose schema authoring rules.

NoAdditionalForeignKeyConstraints.description: If opted-in by a schema, other schemas may not define additional ECDbMap:ForeignKeyConstraint custom attributes.

properties.description: Navigation properties that are allowed violate against the policy. Format: {schema name}:{class name}.{property name}
properties.name: Exceptions

NoAdditionalLinkTables.description: If opted-in by a schema, other schemas may not define ECRelationshipClasses that cause new link tables to be created.

properties.description: Relationship classes that that are allowed to violate against the policy. Format: {schema name}:{relationship class name}
properties.name: Exceptions

NoAdditionalRootEntityClasses.description: If opted-in by a schema, other schemas may not define entity classes that do not subclass from existing classes (mixins are excluded from this policy).

properties.description: Entity classes that that are allowed to violate against the policy.  Format: {schema name}:{class name}
properties.name: Exceptions

label: ECDb Schema Policies
